content.title: Intro
content.content:
2022
Preceded by
2022
2023
Year
2024
Followed by
2024

Tolkien-related events that took place in 2023.

content.title: March
content.content:
25 - Tolkien Reading Day.
30 - The Battle of Maldon: together with The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth is published in the UK.

content.title: May
content.content:
10 - The Lord of the Rings: Heroes of Middle-earth is released online.
25 - The Lord of the Rings: Gollum is released.

content.title: June
content.content:
6 - The Battle of Maldon: together with The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth is published in the US.
21 - Filming for the second season of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power is wrapped.

content.title: July
content.content:
2 - The 2023 Tolkien Society seminar, takes place at The Hilton Leeds City and it is held Online.
25 - The Lord of the Rings (musical) opens at the Watermill Theatre in Newbury, West Berkshire.

content.title: August
content.content:
15 - Tolkien Calendar 2024 is published.
18 - Game developer Wendell Lariston Hill, Jr. dies.
31 - 3 September - Oxonmoot 2023 is held.

content.title: September
content.content:
2 - Tolkien's Faith is published.
9 - Actor Peter McKenzie dies.

content.title: October
content.content:
15 - The Lord of the Rings (musical) ends at the Watermill Theatre in Newbury, West Berkshire.
24 - The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria is released on PC.

content.title: November
content.content:
8 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Corsairs of Umbar is released online.
9 - A revised and expanded edition of The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien is published in the UK.

content.title: December
content.content:
7 - Christopher Tolkien Centenary Boxed Sets #1 is released




Years
2020 2021 2022 2023 2024 2025 2026
